roleset.name: to designate for a specified use
roleset.note: TICKET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ticket' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. -frames created by Olga (from ticket.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: `` Never Too Young '' is a different sort of work , [*-1] focusing on the 1986 death from cocaine ingestion of Bias , [a University of Maryland basketball star]-1 ticketed [*]-1 for sure pro stardom .

roleset.name: give a ticket to someone
roleset.note: TICKET-V NOTES: Roleset corresponds to VN class butter-9.9. (from ticket.02-v)

role.descr: Mention of ticket itself (probably rare), ticketed with what?

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Just the cops way of covering his butt and making sure he ticketed her with something that would stick!

example.name: Adjectival airline usage
example.text: Does anyone know how long access to the terminals in the USA will be limited to only ticketed passengers?
